Title: Cal m and serenity at Ujjain
Review: The most serene place in Ujjain with a temple, gaushala, trinket shops and rest house. This has the calm and soothing effect of the ISKCON franchise. They also provide you the prasad (full course meals) but better inform beforehand. You may sense a commercial aspect about the temple but they are only devoted bhakts trying to make a point on bhakti , gita And Krishna!

Name: Vijay
Title: ISKCON at Ujjain
Review: For Krishna Devotees, ISKCON has a good presence. High class of neatness is maintained. One find lot of calmness and peace here

Name: Maneesh12345
Title: Hare Krishna Temple
Review: You will get enjoy the company of hare krishna people. In the evening time Krishna dance performs by people. Peaceful and happy environment been developed. Good place, good food, good groceries and books are also available but the cost is slightly higher then market.

Name: Sudesh Tiwari
Title: Hare Rama Hare Krishna
Review: Located near the Ujjain Dewas road. Like all Iskcon temple, neat and clean , enough space to sit and mediate .

Name: Swapnilg146
Title: One more Iskcon
Review: I visited many iskcon temple located in various cities and yet Iskcon Ujjain a must visit place. Bit crowded and well managed and like always god's idol here are beautiful.

Name: authorneelesh
Title: not ancient
Review: a new mandir relatively being only 100 hundred years oldnothing special about it except a hie ganesha idol. People visit it because of the hype and because it is opposite the Mahakal temple. can be avoided.

Name: parmanand06
Title: lord krishna temple
Review: Here lord krishna idol is main idol. In world wide there is lots of ISKCON temples are available.The best place to find peace . Beautiful temple . The arti at temple is so mesmerizing it will take you to another world.A very well maintained, clean and landscaped temple.

Name: vikram218
Title: Peaceful and Prayerful
Review: In the holy city of Ujjain this is a must visit along with other landmarks. Beautiful deities and don't forget to visit the Gaushala behind the temple.

Name: nilesh_nagar
Title: Great place
Review: Visited ISKCON temple with family. It was great place to visit and one will get peace of mind for sure. Like any other ISKCON temple it is beautifully made and must visit place. U will get good food too here don't forget to take Prasadam, it's tasty. It's must visit place in ujjain.

Name: uday s
Title: City of temples
Review: Pretty much like the other ISKCON temple. It is carved out of marble and the place is well maintained.

Name: Adv Ashish F
Title: Nice place
Review: I visited along with family . Nice archiological place . Temple is in the heart of the city. Time limit is prescribed by the temple to visit .

Name: Satveer S
Title: Best lord krishna temple
Review: It's a best temple of lord krishna to philosophy and so many devotees visit there and god bless them and especially during janmashtami time there is a huge number of devotees visit here and this temple is situated at best side in Ujjain too. So you must visit there and bless god.

Name: RamGanesan
Title: A typical ISKON temple
Review: Far away from the city.  If one has time to spend at Ujjain then a visit is recommended. Otherwise it is very similar to most ISKON temples in other small towns.  Well maintained and kept clean.  The Aarathi is worth experiencing at ISKON temple.  There is enough parking space and there are also a few small shops inside the temple.

Name: Phb0414
Title: Hare krishna
Review: this temple is situated far from main city.. it is close to one and only mall in ujjain... its a beautiful temple... unlike other iskcons here limited food items are available at iskcon eateries..

Name: lakeoflight
Title: Great food, but
Review: Usually a good place to meet intersting and spiritually inclined people, temple grounds are kept nicely and temple and dieties very attractive,BUT -  the cold, and often rude, immature characters given the work of answering phones dealing with the public has made finally give up on attending their programs.  Plenty of other places to worship that make others feel welcome and that tbey are in the comoany of tbe mentally healthy.

Name: rohanmalhotra
Title: Peace of Mind
Review: Its as good as most of the ISKCON temples i have visited. clean, calm and feel blessed when you enter the temple. Best thing about these temples is the quality of status. Cant explain in words. Spacious temple . Can spend 30-60 minutes. Has few shops with in the campus selling snacks , books and souvenirs

Name: Vikas285
Title: Calm and peaceful
Review: A good place to visit. Not so much things if you had visited other Iskcon temples. A good temple in Ujjain to spend time and see lord Krishna's beauty

Name: mimi_mechosem
Title: Vaishnav temple of Lord Krishna and Radharani
Review: This temple known as angrenjo ka mandir in local people.This temple is a very wonderful and vibrant temple, with exquisitely beautiful deities, a befittingly gorgeous opulent temple, a flourishing Tulsi garden and attractive lush flower garden. when we here, we feel very peace in mind .

Name: S K GUPTA
Title: Spiritual bliss with radhekrishna
Review: This was my first visit to an iskcon temple and we were impressed by the temple, its premises, the extraordinary chanting and prayers. It gives a real peace of mind. The cleaniless and housekeeping is really great. Guest house facility is comparable to good hotel. Nice place to visit and stay for spiritual bliss.

Name: Naveenpawar
Title: Best Place to Visit
Review: Feeling awesome after Darshan of Iscon Temple. Amazing place to visit. Attend aarti when you visit Iscon temple.

Name: CNJ97
Title: Radhe Krishna
Review: As the ISKON group famous for their temples. This temple is one of them. Peaceful place where u can take name of krishna. U can relaxe also there. The guesthouse facility available there. The cleanness is also available in temple.

Name: 1234mano
Title: Ss
Review: Ok Attend article at 4.00 pm it is really Nice,also good to purchase of sandalwood items ,n other jewelry,

Name: Sneha D
Title: Hare Krishana..
Review: Jai shree krishan or radhe radhe.. it's a feeling of God.. u can feel God is in front of u.. awesome place for relaxation.. n being in touch with spiritual peace.. u can enjoy chants n bhajans here.. good is awesome.. it's call Prasadam.. really test like Prasadam.. if u want to stay here hv to follow there rules n regulations.. we enjoyed a lot.. Radhe krishan..

Name: nilesh_nagar
Title: Great feel. Nice temple
Review: Visited iskcon again this time. It is spread in wide area. Well maintained by the iskcon group. Prasadam was very tasty. It is upto the mark of brand iskcon. Beautifully built. Genuinely give feel of close to lord krishna.

Name: Manish B
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: Very beautiful temple at the holy city of Ujjain. Temple is excellent to visit and spend few hours in worship. Temple made of white marble and dedicated to god krishna. Very pure and divine temple.

Name: chandu9668
Title: Beautiful and peaceful...
Review: Temple is built very beautifully and the moment when you reach and see the god you will feel relaxed and blessed. and the location is excellent

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: Amazing Attraction
Review: One of the best temple i ever visit in ujjain. Its really so beautiful and attractive. Its peaceful place for religious followers,

Name: Varun H
Title: Excellent attraction for religious followers
Review: Its peaceful place for religious followers, Its typical Iskcon temple. you can find food items made by devotees and can by religious things like idol of god etc.

Name: SATISH J
Title: Mr. Satish
Review: Really good place to visit experience to u jain ......   must visit   really nice place to visit and explore the intensity of ujain and indow

Name: Avinash_H
Title: A very peaceful place
Review: We stayed at the guest house of the temple.  The temple has a huge hall and eye catching statues of Lord Krishna & Radha.  The whole atmosphere is so peaceful that it can not be explained but only can be experienced.On the day of our visit, Lord Jagannath was to return in a yatra.  A group of ladies was making garlands of flowers, silently.

Name: 15PKD
Title: PLACE TO RESTORE MENTAL PEACE
Review: Iscon Ujjain is a must visit place for those who want to experience mental peace after a long hectic day. Just be there and sit in the calm and quiet atmosphere of this Devasthanam.

Name: Gaurav C
Title: Beautiful and great temple
Review: ISKCON temple always attracts religious followers.The beautiful statues of Lord Krishna will leave a divine experience on the visitor.

Name: kartikv94
Title: in the lap of krishna
Review: The best place to find peace . Beautiful temple . The arti at temple is so mesmerizing it will take you to another world.

Name: Radha S
Title: Iskcon temple
Review: The temple is similar to other Iskcon temples. Very well maintained. The snacks are delicious. Must see and buy.

Name: Anmol18Gupta
Title: OURA OF LORD KRISHNA
Review: International Society of Krishna Consciousness is a society having a great number of Krishna Temples all over the world. In Ujjain ISKCON is having a very large temple of LORD KRISHNA - the place of divine serenity

Name: npn2000
Title: ISKCON Temple
Review: Iskcon temple is another  iconic temple in Ujjian ,beautifully design and conveniently loacted at dewas raod with easy access with all type of vehicles .peaceful  place

Name: Khatrisunil2013
Title: Divine cleanliness
Review: As all other iskcon temples, ujjain is no exception and it successfully creates religious atmosphere as you enter in clean and beautiful campus. Timings should be known otherwise you may find the darshan closed.Restaurent govinda is also good but a little expensive.

Name: Ruben C
Title: Isckon as always its too Good
Review: Aura of place is similar what you can identify at any Iskcon Temple and you can see the same devotion from all the sadhaks. Temple is  serene and upkeepment is better than most hindu temples.

Name: cagauravpatodi
Title: One of the nicest ISKCON
Review: Complete marble. Amazingly calm Radha Krishna murti. Peace. What else. Sit here and have the nicest of the time in ujjain. After mahakal, one must visit here.

Name: samurai0001
Title: soothing experience
Review: this place has a very soothing effect when you happen to visit it..very calm and composed place to visit

Name: girishanjhim
Title: Best temple attraction of Ujjain
Review: If you want to visit a fresh looking, clean, tidy and harmonious temple attraction, ISKCON is the best place to visit. Various aarti timings and religious books are available on demand.

Name: balav
Title: A nice place in Ujjain for stay.
Review: We were staying in ISKON mandir when in Ujjain. The rooms are very clean and the people are very nice. You can get AC rooms or Non AC rooms as per choice. We also get hot wwater for bathing. Since we were life members, we got the rooms at reduced prices. The guest house is adjecent to the Krishna temple, where the Artis and bhajans are held. There is no Govinda restaurant in ISKON Ujjain as in other ISKON temples. So one has to go out for even a tea or coffee. Also this is about 3 kms from Free Gunj which the main market area in Ujjain. Other wise a nice stay in ISKON.

Name: VinM_9
Title: Jai Shri Krsna
Review: The temple is a new one built some 10 years ago in the ancient city of Ujjain. Is built by white marble sourced from Makrana and some imported and is a typicall Iskcon temple. The door opens 8 times a day and one visitng must follow the strict Hindu food habits. It also have a dharmashala for people coming in from out side places.

Name: Soudiptaadhikari
Title: Family Tour
Review: Excellent place to stay and worship.Great Food,The guest house is very good and clean.The temple has its own lunch arrangements for that you have to buy coupon the rate is aprrox. 40/-

Name: Arti66
Title: Very enlightening ,and spiritual experience.
Review: Beautiful temple and superb darshan of Lord krishana.Bhajans and artiExtremely clean, well maintained gardens, excellent vegetarian food ,good shop.Very peaceful

Name: shiv_ggn
Title: Beautiful temple in the midst of nature
Review: ISKON temple is mesmerizing &  picturesque.Everyone there is so warm & helpful. Temple has a pleasant aura that you will love spending time there doing bhakti & seeing the beautiful piece of art on the ceiling inside. They sell perfumed masala agarbattis for Rs. 180 which is also lit inside temple. Those fond of perfumes & agarbattis should buy. It has a pleasant smell for long time. I am using it every day. Temple premises has a beautiful garden with variety of BIG sized flowers.I recommend that it should be visited with family & friends.

Name: VivekRastogi
Title: Superb Darshan and Dinner at Govinda
Review: One of the great temple of Lord Krishna, where one can have a great and superb deity darshan of Krishna. In evening one can enjoy Bhajan and Keertan. The roof of Temple is very beautiful and the deity at Ujjain Iskcon Temple is one of the beautiful in world.One can enjoy Pure Veg Food at Govinda restaurant.

Name: Dipsy1982
Title: Beautiful temple with peaceful ambiance
Review: in the ancient town of Ujjain, the ISKCON temple stands out. Its a modern temple constructed not very long ago. Absolutely clean, with beautifully manicured lawns and gardens, the place is worth a visit.A very well maintained, clean and landscaped temple. Soothind serene atmosphere outside and inside. Beautiful well kept gardens with many varieties of Dahlia. One is at liberty to spend as much time inside this marvellous attraction meditating, enjoying the atmosphere without disturbance or interference. Ample parking... mandir is close from 1-4 Pm.Selfie not allowed only temple and devotee pics allowed

Name: chow69
Title: BEAUTIFULLY BUILT MODERN MANDIR: GOVINDA RESTAURANT IS FABULOUS
Review: In the ancient town of Ujjain, the ISKCON temple stands out. Its a modern temple constructed not very long ago. Absolutely clean, with beautifully manicured lawns and gardens, the place is worth a visit. The temple complex houses a wonderful guest house and an excellent restaurant-Govinda. The restaurant servers only vegetarian food as expected, but its wonderful for a change. A must visit.

Name: devendra kumar s
Title: Beautiful Radha-Madav
Review: A very well maintained, clean and landscaped temple. Soothind serene atmosphere outside and inside. Beautiful well kept gardens with many varieties of Dahlia. One is at liberty to spend as much time inside this marvellous attraction meditating, enjoying the atmosphere without disturbance or interference. Ample parking available and helpful attendants. No restriction on photography though the serenety of the divine atmosphere must be maintained at all times as simple courtesy. A must for travellers to Ujjain. It was at this temple that I remembered to visit Sandipani Ashram where Krishna-Balram-Sudama ji studied in Ujjain, after seeing a representation of the great sage at one of the beautiful alters.

Name: vinodkhedkar
Title: Hare Krishna
Review: This is a very beautifully built temple at the outskirt of city.Like other ISKCON temples,this is also conducts various religious and cultural activities.This temple is closed in the afternoon between 1 to 4pm.Couple of stalls are there where you can buy books and perfumes.Serene place to visit.

Name: Kailash Ruwali
Title: Small temple with nice sculpture
Review: It is a relatively small Iskon temple compared to others. The sculptures are excellent.  We went in the late evening so missed the ARTI. It was not over crowded. The Bhajan's were soothing and relaxing. There are a few shops in the premises from where one can get sweets, Ghee and snacks to eat. Photography is allowed inside the premises but the combination of Lord Krishna and humans are not allowed.

Name: dr_psb_13
Title: SERENITY
Review: We were on a pilgrimage visit to Ujjain, and being an ISKCON member we utilised the Guest House facilities. The temple is conviniently located,excellent environment  and calm and quiet surroundings. The ISKCON temple was a beauty. Visiting other temples and godly abodes, Ujjain is famous for,the serenity was achieved here. I would recommend all, believers and non-believers , to visit this place and feel the calmness descend your inner self. Even Lord Shiva will bless you.

Name: Achal
Title: very nice build radha madan mohan temple
Review: this temple was build few years ago by Bhakticharu swami at Ujjain - pur white temple is beautiful & nicely maintained temple

Name: RAJESH S
Title: As usual an ISKCON marvel
Review: Well, like all other ISKCON temples, this one too is well kept and clean with some serene surroundings and a good place to meditate.

Name: Pallavi_Raj
Title: for the peace and tranquility of mind & soul
Review: Ujjain is my hometown and My aunt was a regular devotee of ISKOn. its a perfect destination if you are filled up with stress and feeling restless. i love going to ISKON on normal days when i can meet less crowd and can enjoy the company of lord Krishna. the music, mantras and the amazing spirituality which floats in the temple makes your mind and soul so peaceful. its a wonderful place to visit with a huge temple, beautiful garden and amazing devotees...

Name: AranyaVihari
Title: My ISKCON Ujjain visit
Review: It was peak summers of June'09 when I received a call from one of my friends Nityanand Ram prabhu (Hemant). He invited me to join a trip to Ujjain with ISKCON devotees and under his guidance a group of 30 devotees were headed towards this amazing spiritual journey.As soon as we reached in front of ISKCON Ujjain all of us could hear loud kirtan recording of Srila Prabhupada. The sound was coming from a loud speaker hung on top of a tree standing on main road just outside the temple. This was very auspicious and soothing to hear the transcendental sound vibration of famous prabhupada Kirtan which he sung in Nov-1966 at Tompskin Square Park, US.All of us were given the lodging details, room no. etc and 45 mins to get ready and go for breakfast prasad. The temple was looking bright white and shining in sunlight. The guesthouse is very big and a lot rooms inside with ample space and good quality construction as well.After gettiing ready all of us went to take darshan inside temple ahll, I was amazed and struck with wonderful quality of construction which was built within a year. All glories to Srila Prtabhupada's disciples who are taking his desires so strongly and seriously. Quality of prasadam (food) is out of the world and temple has Govinda's restaurant which serves a lot many dishes as per choice like Indian, Chinese, continental etc.........I must say that it was one of the best trips I had in my life so far.....

Name: embeeIndresh
Title: Beautiful and high positive vibes religious temple of Kaali maths
Review: It‚Äôs a religious historical site . You will feel Beautiful vibrations and this where Great poetKalidas got enlightened. Also you must visit kalabhairava temple nearby

Name: dimpoo1971
Title: Very calm and peaceful Temple
Review: Very calm and peaceful place.Its a small temple on the outskirts of Ujjain.I went during last few days of Shrawan month and their was no rush and one can have pleasant darshan of Maa Gadkalika.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Popularly known as the Goddess of Tantra Mantra
Review: Gadkalika temple is located on the road leading to Shri Kalabhairav temple. We visited Kalabhairav temple first and then in return we had Maa Darshan here. This temple is situated in between Kalabhairav and Mahakal temple. its @ 4 km away from Mahakal temple and 2.5 km from Kalabhairav temple.It is believed that the deity in this temple is worshipped by Poet Kalidas. The legend goes that the great poet Kalidas was originally uneducated, but  with his great devotion to the goddess Gadkalika here, he acquired unparalleled literary skills. Specialty of this temple:1. This temple is popularly called as Ujjain Mahakali2. This temple is one of the eighteen Shakti peethas where the upper lip of goddess sati fell here.3.  This temple is located near the village of Gad, hence this temple is famous with the name Gadkalika Mandir. 4. In this temple Maa Durga is situated in the form of Kalika. In the sanctum Maa Face is highlighted and clearly visible along with decorated ornaments. 5. Kalika Devi in this temple is different from other Kalika' s idol such that it is in saffron color rather than black color.6. It is claimed that this Maa Gadkalika is here since Satyuga.Temple timings:Morning 06:00 to Evening 09:00

Name: KeshavChakraborty
Title: Jai Gadkalika Mata: Shakti Peeth
Review: This temple is considered as one of the Shati peethas and also famous among tourists.Face of Goddess is very much bright and lively.

Name: SudarshanKS
Title: A shakthi temple
Review: A very nice shakthi temple, although not part of 18 shakthipeethas. A very nice godess idol, very pleasing to have darshan

Name: abkush
Title: A different roop of Maa Kali
Review: One of the two shaktipeeths in Ujjain.The temple is around 5Kms from Mahakaleshwar Temple. The face of Maa Kali is unlike any other Kali temple I've seen till now.There was not much crowd, when we visited, so darshan was very quick.

Name: skdel2016
Title: One of the  Maha Shakti peetha
Review: It's one of the maha shaktee peetha . When you enter the place you will feel  different waves which relaxes you. A must visit place. Jai mahakali.

Name: AnshumanMaini
Title: Good very short visit
Review: Good place and it took us only 30 seconds to complete the visit because of covid times. Nothing much but one has to go because Goddess gave darshan here to Kalidas.

Name: Gdj
Title: Gad kalika temple
Review: Most famous mata temple in ujjain.a lot of devotees visited temple in navratries.place located at bhairogarh area of ujjain city.

Name: hipiyush007
Title: Mesmerizing temle of Maa kaali
Review: When I enter the temple , I was in a shock and mesmarzed with the beauty of maa kali moorti (statue). I have never seen this kind of form of maa kali. I felt like i was in another world for few mins. Very calm and heavenly place. Must visit place.Do offer 108 lemon maala which is readily available in prshaad ghar outside temple.

Name: Sourav B
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Its a small temple on the outskirts of Ujjain. Though has significance for travelers and locals. Shall take around an hour to finish the entire darshan.

Name: Abhi62001
Title: Devi who blessed Kalidasa
Review: Kalika devi means goddess with dark skin. She is the presiding deity in Ujjain, who wrote beejakshar on the tongue of Kalidasa and made him a great poet. Kumkum archana is done here. No much crowd and parking is easy. Many people offer her bangles, rice and other things for the wellbeing and to get good education for their children.

Name: Raghuraman N
Title: Gadkalika Temple Ujjaini - Sakthi Peet. (Part of Body Upper Lipes) Bhairave name (Kala Gora Bhairava )
Review: Very Power full god. Sakthi Peeth,  (Part of Body Upper Lips) nearby temple there‚Äôs a Bhairava Temple. No one Awear it's related to This Devi. When you visit this Devi, you have to visit the Bhairava Temple.Bhairava name (Kala Gora Bhairava ) I attach the Photos of Bhairava Temple.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A Historical Temple
Review: Situated ear the bharthihari cave and on the banks of the Shipra River is this temple for Goddess kali. It is said that the Maha Kavi Kalidas got inspiration to pen his monumental works in literature.This is not labelled as Sakthi peetam.A small but beautiful well maintained temple. For the importance it has in history , it is a must-see in Ujjain

Name: vinay760
Title: Ujjain Darshan
Review: Very powerful Shkati temple and historic , beautiful temple and devi darsh . this is also must visit for all and it is historically connected with story of Kalidas  who was one of the Gem of Vikramaditya king,  This is clean and nice temple with lots of space for parking etc.

Name: Gdj
Title: Famous mata temple in ujjain
Review: Most famous devi temple in bhairugarh area of ujjain.a lot of devtte visits temple everyday. In every navratri very crowd seen in this temple.

Name: Santosh K
Title: Good place
Review: Very nice and calm place to visit in Ujjain and also very nicely maintained by staff. A must visit place.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Durga Mata tample
Review: Its one its kind of unique temple situated at the outskirt of city location surrounded with green fields. Its overcrowded during navratri season. many devotees comes across india to visit this place.

Name: Gdj
Title: Mata gadkalika templd ujjain
Review: Mata gadkalika temple situated in bhargarh area of ujjain city. I visited temple on navratri. A lot of people worshipped there.

Name: Giri S
Title: Visit to Gadkalika temple
Review: wonderful experience. Was able to perform kumkum pooja maa gadkalika on Friday. No rush and one can have pleasant darshan of maa gadkalika.

Name: trivediar
Title: Amazing & Pious
Review: We went there in the evening and were lucky enough to be witness  of Sandhya Aarti. It was superb experience as the instruments like, Dhol, Tasha, Nagara, Drums, Bells were so synchronized that created amazing experience! Mata Gadhkalika's Darshan was the most inspiring experience!

Name: Sanjaykumar P V
Title: Historical importance
Review: Temple worshipped by poet Kalidasa and historically important. Small and significant in history.  Good to spend some time

Name: rathod2017
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Gadkalika Temple, this is a temple of kalika. but so many idols of god and goddess are also there. this one is the historical place in ujjain.

Name: Neelamraju
Title: Kali Mandir
Review: One of the must see places when you visit Ujjain apart from other tourist attractions and places of pilgrimage is Gadkalika Temple.The idol in the temple of Gadkalika, is supposed to have been worshipped by Kalidasa. It is said that Kalidasa was an uneducated person and it was due to his dedication to Goddess Kalika that he earned her blessings and also acquired unparalleled literary skills. GadKalika is considered to be one of the Shakthi Peethas.We were at the right time for Aarti close to the afternoon and were able to offer Kumkumarchan ( a pooja with Sindhoor to the Goddess) as well as participate musical beats by a special set of devotees playing Drums and the Temple Bells..The drums and bells were so excellent to hear that we got carried away by clapping as hard as we could in rhythm (We all had sore hands after that!!). It was an amazing experience.We have actually compiled a list of Shakti Peethas and Jyothirlingas and hopefully be able to visit all of them..

Name: rush-tr
Title: Kalidasa found it very attractive back then, but not anything special today
Review: Surely Kalidasa saw the temple in its most simple form, and not today's florescent colours. The building itself is old but completely covered up with all the jazz that one sees in most religious places in India, and hence unattractive. It was said that Kalidasa achieved enlightenment here under a tree and used to spend lot of time in this temple.The temple is situated on outskirts (three to five km.away.), though not very far, perhaps four km from centre. Autos are easily available to reach there. but coming back may not be easy. It is better to hire auto that waits there. we reached right at the time of noon aarti. The drums and bells were blasting and a woman started getting into the rhythm of the music. It was an experience. If you have some time, it is fine to visit, but if you are tight on time, this temple can be easily missed. There are many temples in Ujjain, and most look similar. Unless you are religious and want to visit, it is fine.Though it is temple and is appropriate to wear modest clothes, but there is no dress code and any outfit is fine.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One of the 52 shakti peedams
Review: This is one of the 52 shakti peedams in India where the satis ELBOW believed to have fallen. The famous legend poet kalidas who was once a ordinary gained literally genius after getting the blessings from this peedams. This is one among the 18 famously important shakti peedams.its believed that KAMAKYA TEMPLE IN ASSAM IS THE CREATIVE SHAKTI while MANGALAGAURI IN GAYA IS THE PROTECTER AND MAHAKALI IN UJJAIN IS THE DESTROYER and all 3 lies in straight line.

Name: Hitesh Rathore
Title: Kali temple in outskirts
Review: This Kali temple is located in the outskirts of the city . nothing very special about it and you can actually skip this if you are visiting to explore

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Shakthi peedam
Review: It is a famous temple.The temple is very medium size temple.There is a resonable crowd of the visitors.

Name: babita13
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: the list of temples in Ujjain is very big. this is a one which is very neat and well maintained place. The Kali idol is very beautiful. . Must visit

Name: Namjoshi
Title: Gadkalika Mandir
Review: This is near Bhartruhari Gufa. This is related to Mahakavi Kalidasa. This was rebuilt by King Harshavardhan in 7th century and again by King Parmar from Malawa.

Name: Vamsidhar K
Title: Goddess power.
Review: This is one of the Shakthi Perth. Not much of publicity is done for this place but a clean, small place which will give you an instant feel of energy and serenity when visited. Must see.

Name: Jayashree G
Title: Kalidas‚Äôs Kali maa
Review: This is the Kali maa who bestowed knowledge on Kavi Kalidasa.  Her compassionate countenance fills one with peace and happiness.  Every visitor to Ujjain must visit this temple.  The temple sanctum sanctorum also has the moorthis of Lakshmi and Saraswathi.

Name: Dilip123
Title: An ancient temple of goddess Kali
Review: This is one of the most important and ancient temples in the city of Ujjain. This goddess was worshiped by the great Sanskrit poet Kalidasa. A board in the temple mentions that archaeological evidences that date back to BC era have been unearthed in this temple.A must visit for devotees and people interested in history.

Name: meghashyam
Title: Maa
Review: One of the three kaal temples , other two being mahakaleshwar and kaal bhairav temples . At this place the presiding deity blessed mahakavi kalidas and raja vikramaditya .It's one of the eighteen shakthipeeth .

Name: Krishnaveni S
Title: Kali worshiped by Kalidasa
Review: This is an ancient temple. The Kali idol is said to be of mahabharata age. The temple was built by king Harshavardhana and the present form it was built by Maharaj of Gwaliar. The Kali idol is very beautiful. Very neat and well maintained. Must visit

Name: Omkar P
Title: REVIEW OF GADKALIKA TEMPLE
Review: The temple is situated at very quiet place and statue of Kalika mata is in the temple. There are around 50 steps downward side.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: It is believed that Kalidas got wisdom at this place and is not a shaktipeeth but very important temple.

Name: Viral Arya
Title: Jai Maa Gadkalika
Review: A must visit and one of the famous temples in Ujjain. This temple is dedicated to goddess Maa Kaali. It is believed that Kalidas worshipped Maa Gadkalika, from which he gain knowledge.

Name: sandeeprchavda
Title: Shaktipith
Review: Must visit if you are in ujjain, clean and small temple dedivated to Godess Mahakali. It is one of the shaktipiths

Name: Himanshi_Saxena
Title: Goddess of Ujjain
Review: The temple is dedicated to Gadkalika Devi who is believed to be Goddess of Ujjain. The temple is one of the main attractions of the pious city.

Name: Ktishan Kant Lavania
Title: Jai Maa
Review: I visited this temple with my mother, she really like this temple, this temple is having history with great Poet Kalidas.

Name: UmaBG
Title: Jai Maa temple
Review: Very much famous temple in ujjain. I attended evening aarti and felt very auspicious and holly environment here. Temple is small but very much divine feeling is felt here. A must visit place in ujjain.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: One of the many hundreds of temples in Ujjain
Review: How many of us know our own ‚ÄòKul Dev/Devi‚Äô ? Not many. I don‚Äôt . If I don‚Äôt know my own Devi, what interest will I have in Kalidas‚Äôs kul Devi. A Ganesh temple right next to this temple has a saying that Lord Rama established Ganesh here. But the energy of the place tells you it‚Äôs fake.

Name: nik_0107
Title: Godess Kali
Review: Really a great temple, it is said poet / writer Kalidas got his fame after getting the blessings of Goddess Gadkalika.

Name: Anjani S
Title: good temple to visit in evening
Review: nice Temple to see. best view you will get in evening. this is part of the package offered buy auto rickshaw drivers.

Name: Dev-Shiv on a Trip
Title: Poet Kalidas was Blessed here !
Review: This temple is famous since Poet/writer Kalidas became what he was after getting the blessings of Goddess Gadkalika. Enjoy the calm and peace. A steady stream of visitors is always there. Prasad shops are outside the complex. Very old and heritage temple with new construction surrounding it.

Name: chirag kothari
Title: Old Kali temple
Review: This temple is of maa kali and said to be one of the shakti peeth. It is said that poet kalidas attained knowledge on blessings of maa kali. We had great darshan at this temple.

Name: Ani De
Title: Beautiful face of kali
Review: The temple is very small and not atall maintained . But the goddess face is so beautiful that u will forget all the other things.

Name: samsamal
Title: Kali Inspired Kalidasa here
Review: Lively place in the midst of greenery and quite little village on outskirts of Ujjain. One needs to have own transport arrangements to visit here.Ample parking place outside teple with loo facilities. Footers not allowed inside. Very small temple, perhaps due to ravages of time.The beautiful deity known as Garh Kalika ( Garh meaning a fort in ancient times; and Kalika the presiding deity, the one who is dark skinned and the mother of Universe controlling the Time) Legend says the great poet Kalidada, who was illiterate and abandoned by his wife for being a dumb fool, used to visit, pray, meditated & did penance for years on years, With his devotion, Devi granted hum wisdom and rear is history. The poet thereafter carved masterpieces, among them Meghadootam is recommended.

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Have a Grace of Devi Gadkalika
Review: The Temple is an ancient one. The Gadkalika Devi is a Shaktipith and was a Kul-Devi of famous poet Shri Kalidasa. The temple is very very peaceful. There is no rush. The temple is very well maintained. Very neat and clean. Do not forget to offer prasad of liquor as done at Kal-Bhairav temple in Ujjain only. Not to miss masala nimbu soda near the temple. Must visit temple when at Ujjain.

Name: mehul vyas1999
Title: Kuldevi of kavi kalidash.
Review: Devi gadhkalika was the kuldevi of kavi ( poet) Kalidash. After blessed of devi he becomes pandit ( most educated person) in shanshkrit language,  and he wrote many poetry , poetry drama..  Inthis mandair evening aarti is attraction.

Name: Kingshuk P
Title: Old historical place
Review: Good to see such old historical place where Kalidas was associated. By look one can see it is old place. Well maintained

Name: sbgholse
Title: Mahakali-Shaktipeeth
Review: This is famous godess mahakali temple in Ujjain.It is associated with Kalidas and lord Ram.Its considered as very powerful godess.Alongwith it there is a temple of Lord Ganesh and Hanuman.The temple is small but beutiful and not so decorated.

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Peaceful
Review: One of the Shaktipeeths situated in Ujjain. Nice ambience and peaceful. Good to visit at any time of the year

Name: Geeess
Title: History and legend
Review: The Goddess is worshipped here along with others.Her fame comes form the Ramayan where she is mentioned as Lord Rama returned victorious from war and rested nearby.Within the temple is the ancient mythological statue of Ganesha, in front of it is the ancient Hanuman temple. Vishnu has a magnificent quadrangular statue attached to it, which is wonderful and scenic.It is not one of Ujjain's iconic temples but is close to some of them and can be seen quickly

Name: S Balaji
Title: Boost of Sakthi (Sakthi peetam)
Review: Small is beautiful. Small temple but very beautiful deity. It's one of the Sakthi peetam and very powerful goddess. It is a must visit and not too far from the main city. If you in ujjain it's a must visit.

Name: PankajDeep
Title: One of very holy shaktipith of Mataji among 52 Shaktipith
Review: Very spiritual and holy experience while praying here.This is very famous and old Shaktipith among 52 Shaktipith.Must to visit.

Name: Sunil K
Title: Its a also nice temple to visit of
Review: Here Gadkalika temple is situated  which is also a shaktipeeth.its also a must place to visit for travelers.

Name: Sunil K
Title: Maa Kalika Shati Peeth
Review: The temple is just on the way to Bharthri Gufa and Kal Bhairav Temple. Very popular temple in Ujjain and must visit while in Ujjain. All facility like prashad and pooja samigri is available there like other temples. Very peaceful environment

Name: Nits90
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: Temple is beautiful and located at beautiful location too. You can find eateries opposite to temple. Not much rush there. And it's near Kal Bhairav temple.

Name: shivangm871
Title: Good temple
Review: Considered to be one of the Shakti Peeth of Hindu mythology, this old temple is comparatively less explored. Needs some kind renovation.

Name: Lalit Surjan
Title: An Ancient temple
Review: In the city of temples that is Ujjain this is yet another ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Durga, worshipped by Mahakavi Kalidas but there is no trace of its past glory except three large stone carvings that need cleaning, restoration and conservation.

Name: sanjayvora45
Title: Goddess Kalika
Review: Near to Mangalnath and sandipani ashram this Gadkalika temple is dedicated to Goddess Kalika. Deity here was worshipped by Kalidas. Area is Silent and Bhruthari caves is nearby.

Name: uday s
Title: Kalidas and Kalika
Review: This temple is dedicated to Kalidasa and his beloved Goddess. This is one of the most famous temples around.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Popular temple dedicated to Goddess
Review: This is relative a small but popular temple dedicated to Goddess Kalika in the town of Ujjain. The temple has a historical significance and the great poet Kalidas was known to be a devotee of the goddess.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: oldest temple of kaalima
Review: one of the oldest temple of kaalimaa in ujjain the shakti peeth .. felt happy ..by doing darshan of kaalimaa

Name: traveller_prk
Title: Town goddess revered by the locals
Review: Small but a great temple. She is also supposedly the protector of the town and revered by the locals. W were told that visit to Ujjain would be incomplete without taking her blessings.

Name: ramki09
Title: ancient temple
Review: gadkalika temple is a kali mandir.kali Devi is a very powerful Goddess.Poet kalidas whose verses were once quite ordinary gained popularity by blessings of gadkalika

Name: ChennaiFocus
Title: Devi who blessed Kalidas
Review: A must see temple, devi just does not move away from our eyes with the cute gold colored teeth, Devi in this is one of the Kali peetam of the 18 peetams across India.

Name: DrArunAgrawal
Title: Ancient temple in outer Ujjain that must be visited
Review: Gadkalika temple is an ancient temple located close to the banks of river Shipra ,   away from the hustle and bustle of the City. The deity in this temple is believed to have been worshipped by the famous poet Kalidasa. The legend goes that he was an idiot and it is by his devotion to the goddess Kalika that he acquired great literary skills. Well worth a visit . Mangalnath temple and Maharshi Sadapani Ashram are also nearby .

Name: vaida17
Title: gadkalika temple
Review: this temple is dedicated to maa kali. this deity is reported to be self formed, and is in standing position.  Maa Kali devi appeared before Kalidasa, from king vikramaditya  periods, and wrote on his tongue and he became a world known poet. he was originally a shepherd, with no education. this temple is located around 5 miles from ujjain railway station.  generally this is not being found on the tourists spots at ujjain.  located at a calm locality with a handful of interested devotees.  the priests over there are quite cooperative and helpful

Name: JASVINDER1981
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: It is an Ancient temple of goddess Kali situated in outer Ujjain. The Temple is situated far away from city crowd in calm and beautiful environment.

Name: Raviraj
Title: Superb temple..
Review: It's very near to Ujjain. From Ujjain you can travel in Auto's they will charge 200-250 they will only show another 5-6 temples...

Name: tripfreak54
Title: Wisdom Gained!
Review: Gadkalika Temple is devoted to Goddess Kalika.  Apparently, Kalidasa ,the great poet received his poetic powers through his genuine devotion to this deity. Kalidasa served as advisor to Maharaja Vikramaditya. The Kali Maa here with her beautiful eyes is a joy to behold.

Name: VivekRastogi
Title: Divine Experience of Mother Kalika
Review: When you visit Ujjain, you can't miss the darshan and divine experience of Mother Kalika, During Navratri Mother Kali also have prasad of Wine. Please do visit the temple get blessed.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: The famous Ujjaini Mahakali temple
Review: This temple is the abode of the famous Ujjaini Mahakali. Though it is a small temple, it looks very beautiful and the Goddess is believed to be extremely powerful.

Name: Ashoklawyer
Title: Historic
Review: Powerful Deity GADKALIKA. This temple has the legend associated with Kalidas and King Vikramaditya. Historic place.

Name: Ankush Goel
Title: one of the 3 kaal temples
Review: The idol of goddess if full of energy and this is one of the 3 kaal temples. Mahakaal, Gadkaalika and Kaal Bhairav.

Name: priyankprudhvi
Title: GadKalika temple - One of the Shakthi peeth (1 of 18)
Review: Shakthi Peeth (1 of 18) temples which is having prominance that Kali devi's Upper lip was fallen here and came into existance from old days.

Name: raofca
Title: Be there for the aarthi
Review: Be sure to stay back for the evening aarthi at around sunset. The young folks mesmerize you with the drumbeats and you really can't keep wondering about the fervour with which they go about it.

Name: Rahul
Title: Beautiful temple.
Review: It's a beautiful temple on the way to Kal Bhairav temple. Would highly recommend a visit to this temple.

Name: AnirbanBasu
Title: Religious place of historial significance
Review: Gadkalika Temple has great religious and historical significance. Temple of Kali where the great poet Kalidas used to pray. The aarati in the evening attracts lot of devotees and performed with great fervour.

Name: AEFWON
Title: Mata ji ka mandir hain, jana hi padhega
Review: a bit lengthy trip from Ujjain city, but worth visitingI have seen few Telugu people spending their Dussehra time entirely here too.

Name: Rajasekhar T
Title: Ujjain trip
Review: This is the temple of maa Kali . One of the avatar of Shiva. It is a small temple. Beware of pandith ji. They can bluff you by telling to perform puja.

Name: yogindery
Title: Gadkalika Temple
Review: Gadkalika Temple is also very famous temple in sight seeing place in ujjain. very beautiful murti of maa gad kaalika situated there.

Name: Manish B
Title: Jai Mata Di
Review: The Gadkalika temple is situated 2 kms from main city and its easy to locate. The temple is said to be the place where great poet kalidas use to visit and worship and due to this he is got the blessings and become great poet. Ancient temple to visit. Calm and peaceful place to visit and worship.

Name: Chander S
Title: Powerful deity
Review: A shakti peeth where body part of Sati had fallen. good place for meditation with strong vibrations.

Name: BK_TheTraveller
Title: Jay Maa
Review: They say the visit to Ujjain is totally incomplete if you do not pay visit to three deities which have the word "Kal" in them. Mahakal, Kal Bhairav and Gadh Kalika. Must go place!!

Name: Sivanandam_mudhali
Title: Gagkalika Temple, Ujjain
Review: This is the temple located 5 km away form Ujjiain Railway station. You can visit this temple in Half day tour of Ujjina. This temple is on the way to Kaal Bhairav mandir, about 1-2 KM from here.This temple is believed to have worshiped by Kalidas, who acquired the literally skill by worshipping this goddess.We were fortunate to see aarti of maa kaali, very peaceful place. Please visit.

Name: banjara_abhi
Title: Where Kalidas did the worship
Review: After Harsiddhi temple nearby the Mahakaleshwar you gonna discover it bit away from main Ujjain city. If you gonna start Ujjain city tour your guide will start from here. Not much crowded but a lot of religious feeling will make you feel Jai Mata Di. The pindi of goddess seems adorable.

Name: HS-MISRA
Title: Historical Temple
Review: Garh Kalika Temple is very famous attraction of Ujjain and it falls on the route to Bhartrihari caves and other local sites of the city. This temple is famous as the renowned Sanskrit Poet Kalidas worshipped this goddess. It is said that it was the blessings of this goddess ( Kalika- a form of goddess Durga) that Kalidas became such a miraculous poet from his early foolish life. Overall the site is good.

Name: BhatiaSandy
Title: Awesome during Navratra
Review: Visited this temple in April 2016, just awesome, clean but hustle bustle of being this place in main city area. A must visit for every traveller in Ujjain.

Name: Naresh Prajapati
Title: Easy Darshan of MAA Kali ‚Ä¶.
Review: Gadkalika Devi is worship of Great lyric poet Kalidas. Temple is very old. Temple renovate in 10th century by King Harshvardhan Rai. Gadkalika temple is small temple in Ujjain. Easily Darshan of matadi. You can also take photos & video of temple. Gadkalika temple is near to Shri Mahakal Temple of Ujjain.Spiritual Darshan of Devi Kali and there is very BIG Pallee with so many lamps on there. It is really nice look to see with lights.If you have time & want to spend there than it is OK, otherwise no need to add this place in Ujjain tourist place4-5 Small shops are available outside of temple to buy ‚ÄúPooja Samagree‚Äù.Jay MAA KALI

Name: guddu1954
Title: mesmerizing deity
Review: The presiding deity is mesmerizing to the extent that you would come again and again to have darshan of the deity.A memorable experience.

Name: Radha S
Title: Gadkallika devi awesome
Review: I and my mother visited this temple. Great temple and goddess murti is so bright and lively. It's divine experience.

Name: EnakshiC
Title: Jai ma Kali!
Review: Goddess Kali is someone I have prayed to from childhood, and is a favorite goddess. So the opportunity to visit her temple in Ujjain could not be passed on. The idol is just her face, which the priest and everyone else prays to. It is similar to Kolkata's kalighat temple, where the torso of the goddess is prayed to. We spent sometime here, as it was a little crowded on Saturday. It is a nice temple. There is not too much space to sit and medicate though. Nice visit.

Name: simham
Title: Kalika Mandir
Review: The Mother Kali is said to have written Bijakshara on later Mahakavi Kalidas & blessed an ordinary person with enormous knowledge and poetic talents. Kalidas is said to have done upaasna here. The Temple has survived but the present structure is about 100 years old. Meditate here & find solace in the Mother

Name: cosmic_avi
Title: Normal temple. But my visit was worth it as I met a damru guy and got to play damru for the aarti
Review: Ujjain being city of shiva temples, it is very difficult to distinguish exceptional ones from normal ones. This for me, fell into the category of a normal temple. But had an amazing experience here. A guy named Mr Meena, goes around ujjain temples played by damrus during Aarti. He has 9 damrus floating around different temples. He happened to be at that temple while I was there and stroke a conversation. And it eventually turned out that I ended up playing Damru for the Arti.

Name: narasimham1949
Title: matadi temple
Review: Nice and small temple and darshan is very pleasant and one should see the temple and blessings of matadi.pepole can photos.

Name: chanse3
Title: DEITY OF POET KALIDASA
Review: Gadkalika temple is on the out skirts of Ujjain. Temple is dedicated to Kali. Huge vermilion covered face with stretching tongue. It is said Kalidasa a famous poet who was idiot acquired literary skills by his devotion to Goddess.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: So Peaceful area
Review: Chintaman Ganesh temple is also one of the most visited temple in Ujjain District. Self-manifested Lord Ganesh temple dates back to 11th and 12th Century. This temple was built during Paramaras kings and later renovated by Maratha kings. Lord resides here with his consorts Siddhi and Buddhi. This temple was built across river Kshipra on the Fatehabad railway line. Chintaman is ancient Hindu word that means relieving tension. It is believed by the devotees that lord Ganesha here gives complete relief to each and every devotee who visits the deity in times of stress. This is Biggest lord Ganesh temple in Ujjain. This  lord Ganesh is believed as Swayambu and three forms of lord Ganesha are seated together, which are known as Chintaman Ganesha, Ichhamani Ganesha, and Siddivinayak.  Chintaman Ganesh removes worries, Ichhamani Ganesh fulfils desires and Siddivinayak gives Riddhi-Siddhi. For this reason, devotees comes here from far places to get blessings of this God. This is one of the four ancient naturally originated Chintaman Ganesh temple in India.  Temple timings:  Morning 06:00 - 12:00 and Evening 05:00 - 10:00

Name: skdel2016
Title: Good Ganesh Temple
Review: The place is named as  Lord Ganesha will end worries who worship here. Place is famous for Marriage  & Lagna and writing Lagna patri . It is believed that one can marry here 24x7 round the clock. No Muhart for Merage is required here. Well managed temple complex. Should be vested.

Name: Gdj
Title: Chintaman ganesh temple ujjain
Review: Very old and attractive temple of lord ganesha.about 5 km away from mahakaleshwar temple.attracive sindur shrangar of lord ganesha done by temple pujaris.

Name: nugu9956

Name: Gdj
Title: Chintaman ganesh temple ujjain

Daily lots of local devotees and tourist from various part of india visited this place to get the blessings from lord ganesha.

Name: trivediar
Title: Divine & Holy Attractive Temple
Review: We were lucky to get darshan of Chintaman Ganesh Ji Temple very nicely and without any rush. It is one of the must visit temples in Ujjain.

Name: Gdj
Title: One of the most religious temple in ujjain
Review: Chintaman ganesh temple in ujjain is most religious temple in ujjain. Most eaceful place. Ujjains one of the famous temple.

Name: CHETANsurat
Title: JAY SHREE GANESH
Review: VERY BEAUTIFUL LOARD SHREE GANESHJI TEMPLE,It is near Ujjan  Shree Mahakal Temple.The temple is dedicated to Lord Ganesha, who is regarded as the Lord of beginnings as per the Hindu beliefs. In the traditional times, the Lord is known as 'Chintaharan', which literally means remover of all worries and tensions. The temple is thronged by crowds of people that come to do away with all their worries at the shrine of the Lord. The term 'Chintamani' is another name used for Lord Vishnu, who is considered as the preserver of the Universe as per Hindu Mythology.

Name: rathod2017
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: Chintaman or Bade Ganeshji Ka Mandir is located close to the tank of the Mahakaleshwar Temple. well maintained and clean place.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A Swayambu Ganesh Temple in Ujjain
Review: This 11th Century Ganesh temple at about 6 Km from the town of Ujjain has a beautiful Swayambu Ganesh as the main deity. Ganesh is flanked by His two wives , Riddhi and Siddhi. The temple  has a beautiful structure and fairly well kept. The Vinayaka is said to  clear the worries of the devotees.The ancient temple is one which still exudes the ancientness.

Name: Yogesh L
Title: Must Visit
Review: This is a small temple next to Ram Ghat and is a must visit. Most poojas take place in this temple premises and havan too.

Name: KrA
Title: Swayamabhu Ganesha
Review: Jai Shree Ganesh.Located a little outskirts of Ujjain. Temple is small though campus area is very big.The idol is said to be swayamabhu(self-manifested).Not much crowd. We visited on Wednesday evening. Easy darshan.No specific temple management people.No need of guide or pandit there.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Suyambu ganesh
Review: This is believed to be a must visit place and the main deity is lord ganesh who along with shiddhi and buddhi  blesses his devotes. The deity in the sanctum is like a small kundu of some 4 or 5 inches in height and allowed to perform pujai by all devoties. The temples is near the city entrancewhile coming from indore.

Name: Hitesh Rathore
Title: A ganesh temple
Review: another ganesh temple in the city which do not have speciality but just a location which is  little away from the city.

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Holy Place
Review: The place is holy.It is a holy visit.It is a ganesh temple.The place is very nice and well clean.It is a well known temple in the place.

Name: Namjoshi
Title: Chintaman Ganesh, Ujjain
Review: It is said that Statue of God Ganesha is swayambhu. You can see pillars which were built during 6th century.

Name: Ajay KMehta
Title: Beautiful Form and temple
Review: Great ancient temple where Lord Rama Prayed to shri Ganesh.Very peaceful and quiet and makes you go within.

Name: Payal G
Title: Crowded
Review: This is a very renowned temple in Ujjain near the Kaalbhairav temple. The idol is huge.The temple can get very crowded because of the large number of devotees in the narrow entry to the main chamber (normal for most Indian temples) but the crowd is generally well behaved. Check out people sticking coins on the wall at the entry to the chamber.There are lot of monkeys in the temple but the real nuisance are the kids selling flowers and grass who keep pestering all the visitors. Best to ignore both.

Name: Omkar P
Title: REVIEW OF CHINTAMAN GANESH TEMPLE
Review: This is the temple of Chintaman Ganesh situated on the bank of river shipra and well maintained by temple authority.

Good temple worth visiting but unfortunately not very well maintained. Administration need to work on maintaining the temple area. Enough parking area and not far from ujjain.

Title: Swayambhu idol of Lord Ganesha
Review: The temple is very old and dates back to 11th century. It is famous, since the idol is believed to be swayambhu (self manifested) and offering prayers in the temple is believed to pacify one's worries.

Name: UmaBG
Title: Very old temple of shri ganesha
Review: Chintaman Ganesh temple is very old ganesha temple believed very blessed place. Local people has many beliefs for this temple.

People also make wishes which they want fulfilled and tie a red thread to mark the same and need to comeback and pay homage once it gets fulfilled and untie the thread.

Title: Visit

Title: Very peaceful & holly place

Name: sovizss
Title: Jai shree Ganesh
Review: Jai shree ganesh"Om gan gan patay namo namah shree siddhivinayak namo namahAasat vinayak namo namahMagal murti morya"Shree ganesh ji we know him by many namesLikeGanesh = gan + ishattgan = bhagwan shiv ke param sevak( kelash parvat par jo bhi bhoot,preat,aur sevak hy vo sab bhagwan shankar k gan (‡§ó‡§£) kahlate hy ve bahut powerful hote hy un sabme bhagwan shiv ki shakti hoti hy.And Ishatt = aaradhay ( sab gan jinki bat manege aur bhagwan shiv ki puri sena (fouj) unka kahna manegi aur unko pujegi. 2nd name is shree siddhivinayakSiddhi = shreeGanesh ji ki patni ka name hy devi siddhishree ganesh ji ki 2 patniya hy devi riddhi and devi siddhi.Vinayak = ganesh ji ka name hy jo unki aur hamari ma devi parvatiy ne diya.Devi riddhi aur siddhi sab tarah ke sukh,behav,tarakki aur sabi tarah ki siddhio ko dene ki power hy.Shree Ganesh ji ke 2 bete (son) hyLabh  aur shubh3rd name isChintaman GaneshYani sabhi tarah ki chinta, trouble, problems, ko har ( har= khud le le ne vala)Lete hy. Isliye ganesh ji ko shree chintaman Ganesh bhi kahte hy.Is mandir me 1 kuaa Hy hindu dharam me asa likha hy ki is mandir me bhagwan shree Ram, ma sita aur bhaiya laxman 14 years ka vanvas kat ke jab wapas aa rhe tab is mandir me ruke they aur tab ma sita ko pani ki pyas lagi to kuee me pani nhi tha tab bhaiya laxman ne tir mara kuee me aur usme se pani aa gyaTab se ye kuaa kbhi nhi sukha.Ujjain nagri bahut  hi dharmik nagri hyIs nagri me lakho sadhu,tapasvi, rishi muni aate hy aur tapasya karte hy So jo koi ujjain nagri me jaye vo shree Ganesh ji aur shree mahakal raja aur shree kal beharav baba ke mandir jarur jaye Jai ganesh jai shiv shankarbhagwan shiv shree Ganesh ji se bahut jada payar karte hyDevi ma parvatiy ne bahut years tak shree Ganesh ji kathor tapasiya ki aur Ganesh ji se unka beta ban ne ka vardan maga jab shree Ganesh ji ma parvatiy ki bete bane. Shree Ganesh ji parmatma hyVo keval devta nhi hySab devi devtao me ganesh ji sabse pahle puje jate hy bina Ganesh ki puja kare koi puja safal nhi hoti aur na koi subh kam pura hota aur na mana jataHar puja me shree Ganesh ji ko sabse pahle puja jata hyShree ganeshIs a big and very powerful devta in hindu dharam.Everyone loves him bcz shree ganesh is a very sweet and very helpful devta.He never do any wrong with anyone and he always help everyone in trouble.Jai ganesh jai shiv

Review: When we visited this temple, we saw more than 100 newly wed couples with their families standing in line for one glimpse of lord Ganesha. It looked like it is some kind of ritual for locals here.

Name: Satveer S
Title: Must visit place in Ujjain
Review: Ujjain city is famous for large number of biggest and famous temple too and it's a best temple to visit. It's situated at best place in Ujjain have got clean atmosphere too. As there are so many temples in Ujjain and large number of devotees visit there and god bless them. So you must visit at this temple too.

Name: RamGanesan
Title: Ganeshji temple outside Ujjain
Review: Hindu tradition believes that anything that has to start has to be done in an auspicious note.  A visit to the temple before visiting anyother yatra places around Ujjain is ideal.  If that is not possible a visit to Lord Ganesha temple later would suffice but one should not miss out on this temple.  The temple is far away from Ujjain town and hence a lot of tourists do not get here thought it is very famous among the locals.  People visit the temple to place marriage invitations and get Lord Ganesha blessing.  The main sanctum has 5 idols of Lord Ganesh.  One has to hire an auto from Ujjain town to visit this place.  A early morning visit will be very nice as we did.

Name: traveller_prk
Title: A little away from the town
Review: This temple is a little away from the town and also in the other direction of most temples in Ujjain. We had hired an electric auto for our temple tour in Ujjain and realised that it would be way out for us to travel here althogh we had head so much about the temple.

Name: Phb0414
Title: place to start auspicious works
Review: Chintaman ganesh temple is one the oldest temples in city.... ask a ujjaini about importance of this place... temple is away from city life ... early morning visit to temple is more pleasant... place is well connected through public transport

Name: Jitin B
Title: Place to begin your visit with
Review: We started our UJJAIN visit with the same.Highly praised temple as almost everyone who is visiting "Mahakal" visits this place also.We preferred paying over cash offering directly to the "Daan Patra" instead of paying it to the Priest.

Name: 810wanderwoman

On every Tuesdays people use to visit this temple for taking Lord ganesha's blessing. Here you can see monkeys. This is one of the biggest temple in Ujjain and millions of people visit this place in whole year.

Review: Great vibrations. 3 forms of ganesh ji are present here - chintaman siddhi and ichcha ganesh ji. Usually crowded. Fast moving queues.

Review: Its lord ganesha temple and ancient one.in the outskirts of ujjain. Historic and u will surely get peace of mind. I just loved to b here.

Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple is one of them famous temple dedicated to lord ganesha holy cith ujjain is 'temple nagri'.

To stay at Hotel mahalaxmi had beena good experience. Owner is very friendly and supportive . His contact nonis provided for convenience  of all tourists. 09926632003

Name: bonen

Review: Guys i want to visit chintaman ganesh but i have a question. Because i have a wish and i really want that wish to be true. So does anybody have the experience that you asked a very difficult wish from chintamani ganesh in ujjain. And you got it? Do anybody has that experience?

Review: A tample of lord ganesh.  5-6 km away from the ujjain city, very calm and spiritual place. A good picnic spot.

Name: tikkuJaipur
Title: Ganesha
Review: A good and clean temple of lord Ganesha. It is a short visit from main ujjain town. The statute of lord Ganesh looks very relaxing and divine. If you have any wish you can ask for it and tie a thread in the temple.After your wish is granted you have to come back to the temple and worship the diety.

Name: Rohit
Title: Great place
Review: The temple is mainly meant for people facing obstacle in wedding/marriage and is famous to provide them suitable partners. But others may also visit the same.

Name: Kunal Yadav
Title: Lord Ganesh Temple
Review: This Temple is famous for initiation of anything...1st invitation is given to Lord Ganesha Chintaman.When People buy New vehicle first comes here to take blessing and then only go elsewhere.

Name: Anurag Bansal
Title: Nice serene Temple
Review: A huge campus but not well kept. Took me about 20 minutes to reach there by car from Mahakaleshwar temple in the morning at around 7.30am. 'Swayambhu' idol is a rock formation which is smeared with 'sindoor'. As you enter the small sanctum sanctorum you are engulfed by a tranquility  that is hard to explain. A must visit place in Ujjain with nice surroundings & picnic spots that were under construction in view of coming Singhasth 2016.

Name: Travel_Leisure1
Title: Must visit at Ujjain
Review: It is generally believed in mythology to start any darshan with the name of Lord Ganesha. Must visit temple for believers. If travelling by Bus from Indore, it would cost around 80 Rs in Auto to reach here.

Name: Radha S
Title: Om Ganesha
Review: It is was good experience had nice darshan. It's a very old temple of Lord Ganesh. We found lot ladoo shops.

Name: npn2000
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple is at outer ujjain , accessible by raod ,good scenic view , This temple is very famous among locals and Wednesday full with worshipers

Name: Arrunadayy
Title: Beautiful Ganesh Temple
Review: What a Murti of Ganesh ji. You will love this place. We sat there and felt the calm and serine atmosphere here.

Name: Satya S
Title: Nice temple
Review: Nice place to visit. Place is good. Plan to visit this as well when you go to ujjain. Had a wonderful time

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Clean and Neat Ghat
Review: There are many ghats built  on the bank of Shipra river for bathing during Khumbmela. Ram Ghat is also one of those Ghats which is 1km away from Mahakaleshwar temple and 3 km from Ujjain railway station. Ram Ghat is known for:1. Ram Ghat is oldest holiest bathing Ghat compare to other Ghats of Ujjain. 2. Shira Aarthi held here everyday evening which is most memorable moment of this place visit.3. This Ghat is famous for its Sun set View.4. Due to its prime location, Ram ghat witnesses a huge croud during Khumb mela including the Akharas, who arrives here to take holy dip during Khumb.5. Boating Facility is available here during normal days

Name: Kaalsarp dosh pujan Ujjain Price 1500‚Çπ
Title: Kaalsarp dosh pujan
Review: You can contact Guru ji for Kaal Sarp Dosh Poojan.  At present, Kalsarp Puja in the entire city of Ujjain is done by Guru ji with complete Vedic rituals for only 1500 ‚Çπ, its Mangalbhat Puja is also done by Guru ji and Guru ji's birth chart study is also perfect.  Along with all these works, Guru ji also does the worship of Vastu defect prevention and business, business obstacle removal with complete law.

Name: williamsamaddar
Title: Positive vibes
Review: Located on the eastern bank of the Kshipra river, close to the Harsiddhi Shaktipeeth is the oldest and most famous ghat of Ujjain [referred to as Avantika in our shastras]. The place is a hub of various Hindu ceremonies and rituals which take place everyday on the steps of the ghat. This is also where the Kumbh Mela is held every 12 years. The clean and peaceful place is dotted with several temples and exudes a very positive vibe. One of the most spiritual spots in the country.

Name: DKD007
Title: Jai Shipraji
Review: What a place. On the banks of auspicious river Shipraji this is pure bliss. After having darshan at Maa Harsiddhi mandir, sitting on the banks of the river is an experience in itself.

Name: dimpoo1971
Title: DONT MISS AARTI
Review: Its very long ghat by shipra river.people need to maintain cleanliness. highlight without doubt is evening aarti.

Name: Swiggy Wala #swiggywala
Title: Ram Ghat ujjain
Review: üìçShree Ram GhatThis place is very holy place and says that Lord Ram has taken bath after shraddh of Dashrath (his father). Here is no need of queue because its very long.Extremely popular as the venue of the famous Kumbh Mela in Ujjain, Ram Ghat is one of the biggest pilgrim places in India. It is where millions of pilgrims gather during the event. The aarti here is renowned and the ghat is known to be the oldest bathing ghat in Ujjain, almost as old as the Kumbh mela itself

Name: abkush
Title: Ram Mandir Ghat
Review: Ghat itself is quite clean and well maintaned, but the water of Kshipra isn't.There is a lot of garbage (thrown by visitors possibly) keeps floating in the water.There is a huge trishul (trident) from a temple beside it.Nothing much to do, in case you are not planning to have a dip in here.

Name: skdel2016
Title: A place to attend aarti on Shipra river
Review: The place having Shri Ram Mandir at bank of Shipra. Ghats are clean but water is not too clean. People should have some respect where Laks of people come in Singhasth Kumbha. Aarti is being performed at evening where you can enjoy. people come here for Holy Bath , but I wish it could be managed better.

Name: Vilhelmatia
Title: Respect
Review: The attendees to this site has no respect for the complex and water itself. It is need of good scrub and water purification.

Name: Jaspal_Singh
Title: Pious Snana
Review: Ghat is well managed and kept clean round the clock. Good place to do snana, Pooja, japa and worship. Nice mgmt of facilities for pilgrims, even during COVID times. Water is also clean and river well maintained. Must visit.

Name: Gdj
Title: Ramghat ujjain
Review: In most famous ram ghat at the bay of shipra river.according to shastras very importance of snan at mokshdayni shipra river.

Name: ankan146
Title: LORD CHITRAGUPT,,YAMRAJ'S ACCOUNTANT TEMPLE FOUND HERE.  ---DONT MISSSS  AT ALL..
Review: 1)most famous ghat in ujjain near mahakal temple .5-7 minuts only 2)lord chitragupt (accountant of yamraj)  TEMPLE HERE.it is said offer here copy and pen for auspicious reasons.(exclusive and rare temple) 3) SHIPRA ARTI  IS A SIGH TO SEE HERE..IN EVENING.. 4) BATH here alowed but water is slipery,,so beware,,and  dont go far in water..stay near..on steps and use mug/bucket.5)shipra RIVER  ITSELF IS  anant poonya dayini,,,,,so dont miss this famous ghat.clik helpful if liked below review..

Name: Gdj
Title: Ram mandir ujjain
Review: Ram mandir is very famous temple. Very spacious temple. Situated at mahakal mandir area.lord ram laksham and mata seeta murti there.

Name: Debasish Das
Title: Kumbhamela
Review: Good place  to one time see.  There is no connectivy road to go with car. Rather take snap from bridge

Name: Viral Arya
Title: The Holy Bath in Shipra River
Review: One of the most scared Ghats of Shipra River. Most of the people come ujjain, first takes a holy bath in river Shipra then go for Mahalaleshwar Darshan. We aware some pandas, asking for various worship activities. Please don't wash your cloths in holy ghats and also not use any Soap or Shempu.

Name: Gdj
Title: Ram ghat ujjain
Review: Most famous place in ujjain.shipra river flows from this place.all important snans done on this ghat in every simhastha mela.

Name: alpsbt27
Title: Feeling blase
Review: This time in Ujjain visit. on Sunday free time visited Ram mandir ghat. it is really beautiful place lots of crowds found here.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Soothing Riverside experience
Review: Its a very cool plance , one of the Ghat situated at kshipra river. kshipra aari held on daily basis during evening time and its the major attraction of the place.. since the place is close to river u can find a very relaxed and soothing experience at this place. and lots of small temples you can found which is one of the best way of divinity.

Name: Swapan Roy
Title: Ram ghat
Review: By the side of river Shipra , a sacred place where Hindus do believe Raja Ram performed the last rites of his father Dasharath.We went in the evening by hiring a Auto Rickshaw. Hardly 15/20 mins from city centre. Sat silently and enjoyed the sacred place.

Name: _swapan18
Title: Unique
Review: The river Shipra flowing . Visited at night. It was wonderful site.Serene feelings. Can hire auto rikshaw from city and can go back likewise.A must visit site.

Name: Sanjaykumar P V
Title: Good for a walk
Review: Place where people take a dip similar to the one in Dashaswamedh ghar in Varanasi.  Aarti is performed in the evenings and gives a pleasant feel when you walk alongside

Name: Gdj
Title: Ram ghat at shipra river
Review: Ram ghat loketed at shipra river in ujjain. At there every 12 years interval organised simhastha mela.

Name: travel l
Title: Shivaratri
Review: We were here during Shivaratri. I would have expected more people. Very nice in the evenings, the Pujas going on, the Aartis, I like it. Unfortunately it is very dirty everywhere

Name: KChandra
Title: Calm and Serene
Review: We visited this place during our recent tour of MP. We were there in the evening and the place looked beautiful and well lit. The Shipra river had water flowing in it and the steps leading to the river were quite clean. We learnt that Kumbh Mela is held here every 12 years and we saw some of the arrangements. There are a few well known temples along the ghat and they add to the atmosphere of piety.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Ram Mandir Ghat
Review: Ram Mandir Ghat is situated on the bank of Kshipra river. Kumbha mela organised here in every 12 years. Water of Kshipra is polluted. Boating on Kshipra is available.

Name: Yogesh L
Title: Mesmerizing Experience
Review: Visited at night as well as in morning and the place has the calmness and the Serene feeling everytime I went to the Ghat.The River Shipra flows right next to the Temple and is beautiful.

Name: Shankar I
Title: An elaborate Ghat
Review: A beautiful ghat on the banks of the Kshipra river. Devotees take the ritual dip in the holy water and offer prayers. Plenty of dharmshalas are available nearby. The place is well maintained. This is the place where the Ujjain Kumbh mela snan takes place every 12 years.

Name: Neelamraju
Title: Place of Kumbh Mela - Shipra River
Review: After visiting Navagraha Mandir, Sandipani Ashram, Mangalnath Temple, Kalbhairav Temple and Ghadkalika Temple we stopped  at Ram Mandir GhatKumbh Mela is performed here. Kumbh Mela is the largest religious fair held in India. It is a mass Hindu pilgrimage where Hindus gather in large numbers and take bath in a sacred river. This event is held every fourth year at four different places. Sages dressed in saffron attires attend the Kumbh Mela in great numbers.  The mela is celebrated at four different places - Kshipra River in Ujjain, which is also known as Simhastha. Others are on the banks of the Godavari River in Nashik, Ganges River in Haridwar and the Triveni Sangam in Allahabad ( Confluence of Ganga Yamuna and Saraswati)Not only Hindus from India but a large number of tourists, pilgrims and foreign nationals take part in this event.We were supposed to get into the water but honestly found the water to be dirty and avoided taking a dip. Hopefully this place will be clean for the next Kumbh Mela

Name: Prateek
Title: Shipra River visit on Christmas
Review: On the day of Christmas,25 December 2018. I went to Shipra river which is also known as Ramghat in this region. I clicked some photos and videos when i reached here. There are some photographers also available who can click your photos when you are alone. You can bath here in this river but the river is dirty. There are many fishes in this river.

Name: Vishnu Pendyala
Title: Short walk from the main road
Review: Stopped for a few minutes on the way to Harsiddhi mandir, to walk through the shores and take pictures and it was well worth it.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Not clean
Review: We tried to take a dip here but didn't as the water is not clean and is so still. Better to avoid having a bath here.

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Neat in the place
Review: The place was neat and nice to see the ghat when it is neat.The place is beautifull but the river shipra is not well maintained.

Name: poojathakur13
Title: One of the cleaner ghats
Review: The ghat is beautiful and cleaner than many other ghats in India. The kshipra river that it is situated on looks calm and it's worth to spend some time sitting here and observing the activities and the river flow. Quite a calming experience. It depends on the time you go here. If you go during some festival you might see some different ghat in terms of cleanliness.

Name: Ravi D
Title: Divine, but dirty ghats on the bank of Kshipra river
Review: Ramghat is on the Kshipra river and close to the Harsidhi temple and the Mahakal temple. It is a sacred place, but the way is not very clean and the river is also not that clean because it is not a flowing river. Spend 30 - 60 min kinds to take a walk on the ghats.It also has 3 of the 84 Shiva temples in Ujjain (84 Mahadev series)

Name: Dilip123
Title: beautiful ghat and evening aarati
Review: The Ram mandir ghat on the Kshipra river (locally called as Shipra) is the place where the mahakumbh mela is held and is believed to be the place where Lord Rama performed pinda pradhana to his father king dasharatha. The ghats seemed to be well maintained. It is recommended to be at the place around 6 - 6.15PM to witness the evening aarati. The aarati is similar to what is done in Varanasi. Priests perform aarati in synchronization and is a sight to behold. We learnt from locals that water from the Narmada is diverted to Kshipra at Ujjain since the original river has very less water.

Name: Mahesh Kulkarni
Title: Ram ghaat at Ujjain
Review: Ram Ghat at UjjainDirt, filth, discards of garland n flowers keeps stink intact.Water has become black but people take bath, wash clothes, drink same water as well.Complete unhygienic water quality to bath or not for drinking as Tirth.I will reserve my opinion on travellers to visit this Ghaat at all at Ujjain and leave it to their individual discretion but will not advise or urge any devotee to visit at Ram Ghaat.Felt bad to see this unmaintained ghaat.

Name: Sunnilbgautam
Title: Famous Ramghat evening Aarati
Review: This place is quite near to Harsidhi temple. River is totally polluted. But aarati is very good. Try to reach at sundown to witness the Aarati.

Name: Omkar P
Title: VIVIT TO RAM MANDIR GHAT
Review: This place is very holy place and says that Lord Ram has taken bath after shraddh of Dashrath (his father). Here is no need of queue because its very long.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Feel the spirit of Faith
Review: The water is dirty with plenty of faithful offerings but it doesnt deter seeing people pray and take bath. one can witness the evening Aarti and the 84th place of Mahadev of Ujjain ends here. The name is given as God Rama, offered the final prayers for his departed father. Here there is also a place where Nagadosha can be cleansed. There is a temple dedicated to Yudhistra of Mahabharat times.

Name: The Golden Age f
Title: Ramghat
Review: We went in the evening to see ghat aarti, but as it was raining the ghat was under water. Steps could not be seen and chappals were floating all around. There were small small temples all around. But the view was beautiful.We could not wait for long due to rain may be in dry weather the view will be different.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Enchanting
Review: I went to Ram Mandir Ghat. Millions of people throng this place during the mega Kumbh festival as it is believed that a dip here can wash off all you sins. Watching the sunset from the Ram Mandir Ghat is one of the most enchanting scenes you'll experience. It is great place to go.

Name: sandeeprchavda
Title: Semi feel of harki paudhi haridwar
Review: You can go and have a look, not a must visit place, water is dirty as in rest pilgrimage places. Go and spent time here

Name: Ktishan Kant Lavania
Title: Holy Ghats of River Shipra
Review: This is one of the holy ghats of Kshipra river, needs cleaning, I visited with my mother, really needs makeover

Name: UmaBG
Title: Very divine place to visit.
Review: Ram ghat is on the bank of triveni river and a very much divine and peaceful place to visit. Evening is a best time to visit the place and one must attend the evening aarti here.

Name: 1965ng
Title: Great aarti
Review: I have never seen such aarti before. very new and different kind of aarti of Triveni riverwhere many Pandits do puja at the same time. Very enchanted to visit the place

Name: HilsN
Title: Evening Puja a must-see
Review: The ghat is a pleasant place to stroll and is not overcrowded, well, outside Mehla time anyway!  The evening Puja held at dusk was a an interesting and colourful experience and one I'm glad we didn't miss.

Name: Animesh
Title: One of the Holy Ghats of Ujjain - River Shipra and Ghats Certainly Needs Cleaning & Makeover
Review: A relatively cleaner and less crowded ghat as compared to other neighborhood ghats on River Shipra in Ujjain. Visited on 19 Mar 2018. Being Navraatri, many devotees were there for a holy bath. There were unlit diyas lying on the staircase leading down to the river. The parking space for vehicles is nearby and ample. Good to go and spend quiet time to find peace and solace. The condition of river is dirty due to offerings and people taking bath. Overall, a good place for believers and nature lovers.

Name: nik_0107
Title: Rive Shipra
Review: The ghat is located on the banks of holy river Shipra, this is one of the locations of the holy dip during the Mahakumbh in 2016. Best to visit either early morning or in the evening.

Name: Anjani S
Title: very beautiful location, cool breeze of Shipra
Review: this was the best place to walk in Ujain. we have sped 1 hrs there by just sitting and relaxing. Aarati was very nice.

Name: Sunita B
Title: By the banks of Shipra
